name: HappyDreams
0:
”Alexa happy dreams”
”Alexa start happy dreams”
”Alexa launch happy dreams”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy dreams
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Simply say "Alexa, Happy Dreams" and Alexa will respond with encouraging positive good night wishes to help you get to sleep and feel better about your day and your life. Most of us are experiencing high levels of stress and anxiety these days. The Happy Dreams skill will say good night to you in encouraging kind ways each night and help you have a better chance at attaining a more peaceful restful night's sleep.

Enable the Happy Dreams skill and find a new kind word or two waiting for you at the end of your day to help you find more peace. And if you enjoy this please rate and comment accordingly and share it with friends and family so they can find more peace and positive feelings too. Thank you!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
